price: Dan apakah mereka tidak memperhatikan bagaimana Allah menciptakan (manusia) dari permulaannya, kemudian mengulanginya (kembali).  Sesungguhnya yang demikian itu adalah mudah bagi Allah.
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ كَيۡفَ يُبۡدِئُ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡخَلۡقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُۥٓۚ إِنَّ ذَٰلِكَ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ يَسِيرٞ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: awalam yaraw kayfa yub'di-u al-lahu al-khalqa thumma yuʿīduhu inna dhālika ʿalā al-lahi yasīrun
